p: Asymptomatic infection is not limited to young or middle-aged adults [ 21], but also children [ 11], infants [ 22] and even the elderly [ 27]. Hu et al. [ 15] showed that asymptomatic patients were relatively young, with a median age of 14Â years in seven cases. In addition, asymptomatic infections were found in both males [ 19] and females [ 14].
